a whine leaks out the moment my finger touches her.

name: lily
normalized: t-that hurts you idiot!
what are you doing!

name: ichiro
normalized: see～ i knew you were hurting.
nn!
i gesture for her to get on my back for the third time.

name: ichiro
normalized: lily's role is to fight.
my role is to carry.
we playto our strengths.
the right person for the right role.

name: lily
normalized: … i-idiot…
mumbling in embarrassment, lily slowly leans her bodyonto my back.

name: ichiro
normalized: alright, let's go.
lily's weight gives me a sense of responsibility as istart to walk slowly towards home.

name: ichiro
normalized: （somehow, it feels like all kinds of things arehappening…）
i feel like i've been swallowed into some kind of hugewhirlpool.
but, i know i don't have the strength to get out of thatwhirlpool by myself.
i'm only being protected by lily and yuko-sensei withoutme being able to do anything for them…

name: ichiro
normalized: （shit…）
just now i had to hide behind lily, who is even smallerthan i am… she got hurt while protecting me.
the mewho can't do anything.
feeling irritated about my helplessness, the weight ofthe one who frantically protected me makes me hasten mypace back home.
